trans-unit.source: Abstract base class to be implemented by all text to speech synthesis engines.
trans-unit.target: Abstrakt basklass tillämpas av alla sammanfattande motorer för text till tal.

trans-unit.source: To construct a custom text to speech engine, an application must always implement a class derived from the abstract base class TtsEngineSsml.
trans-unit.target: Ett program för att skapa en anpassad text till tal-motor måste alltid implementera en klass som härletts från abstrakt basklass TtsEngineSsml.

trans-unit.source: A properly registered implementation of TtsEngineSsml can then be used as a `Synthesizer``Voice` by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis> name space based applications.
trans-unit.target: En registrerad implementering av TtsEngineSsml kan sedan användas som en `Synthesizer``Voice` av <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis>namn-baserade program.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis>

trans-unit.source: Objects inheriting from TtsEngineSsml must override the following members: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.%23ctor%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.GetOutputFormat%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Objekt som ärver från TtsEngineSsml måste åsidosätta följande medlemmar: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.%23ctor%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A> <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.GetOutputFormat%2A>och <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.GetOutputFormat%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The most important member of the TtsEngineSsml class to be implemented is the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Den viktigaste medlemmen i klassen TtsEngineSsml implementeras är den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> method is called by the infrastructures text parser receiving: 1.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>metoden anropas av infrastrukturer text parsern mottagning: 1.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interface, which provides access to system services such as even queuing and writing audio output.
trans-unit.target: En referens till den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite>-gränssnittet, som ger åtkomst till systemtjänster som även queuing och skriva ljuduppspelning.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instance produced from Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) input.
trans-unit.target: En matris med <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>instans genereras från tal sammanfattande Markup Language (SSML) indata.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>

trans-unit.source: In addition to text to be rendered as speech, the parsing of the SSML stores information about the requested attributes of the speech in a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> instance associated with each incoming <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> object.
trans-unit.target: Förutom text som ska renderas som tal parsningen av SSML lagrar information om de begärda attributen för tal i en <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>serverinstans kopplad till varje inkommande <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>objektet.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>

trans-unit.source: A speech synthesizer application can optionally make requests for a specified output format by implementing <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.GetOutputFormat%2A> to be called by the platform when it tries to provide the correct audio output.
trans-unit.target: Ett tal synthesizer program kan du göra begäranden för en angiven utdataformat genom att implementera <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.GetOutputFormat%2A>anropas av plattformen vid försök att ange rätt ljuduppspelning.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.GetOutputFormat%2A>

trans-unit.source: An implementer can also provide support for managing external definitions of pronunciations, or lexicons, by their implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A>.
trans-unit.target: En implementerare kan också tillhandahålla stöd för att hantera externa definitioner av uttal eller lexikon, genom att deras implementering av <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A>och <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A>

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new instance of <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml"></xref> based on an appropriate Voice Token registry key.
trans-unit.target: Skapar en ny instans av <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml"> </xref> baserat på en lämplig röst Token registernyckel.

trans-unit.source: Full name of the registry key for the Voice Token associated with the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml"></xref> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Fullständigt namn för registernyckeln för röst-Token som associeras med den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml"> </xref> implementering.

trans-unit.source: engine.
trans-unit.target: motorn.

trans-unit.source: Adds a lexicon to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Synthesizer" name="Synthesizer" href=""></xref><xref uid="langword_csharp_Voice" name="Voice" href=""></xref> implemented by the current <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Lägger till en lexikonet till den <xref uid="langword_csharp_Synthesizer" name="Synthesizer" href=""> </xref> <xref uid="langword_csharp_Voice" name="Voice" href=""> </xref> implementerats av aktuellt <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml"> </xref> instans.

trans-unit.source: A pronunciation lexicon is a collection of words or phrases together with their pronunciations specified using an appropriate pronunciation alphabet.
trans-unit.target: En uttal lexikonet är en samling med ord eller fraser tillsammans med deras uttal anges med en lämplig uttal alfabetet.

trans-unit.source: This method is typically called by the platform infrastructure in response to a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis> based applications calling AddLexicon and using the `Synthesizer``Voice` implemented by the current <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml> instance.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden anropas vanligtvis av plattformsinfrastrukturen som svar på en <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis>baserade program anropar AddLexicon och använder den `Synthesizer``Voice` implementerats av aktuellt <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>instans.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis>

trans-unit.source: The value of `mediaType` is typically a MIME specification, as the SSML specification uses MIME for media specifications.
trans-unit.target: Värdet för `mediaType` är vanligtvis en MIME-specifikation som SSML-specifikationen använder MIME för media specifikationer.

trans-unit.source: A valid instance of <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.Uri" name="System.Uri" href=""></xref> indicating the location of the lexicon information.
trans-unit.target: En giltig instans av <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.Uri" name="System.Uri" href=""> </xref> anger placeringen av informationen om lexikonet.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the media type of the lexicon.
trans-unit.target: En sträng som innehåller medietyp för lexikonet.

trans-unit.source: Media types are case insensitive.
trans-unit.target: Typer av Media är skiftlägeskänsliga.

trans-unit.source: A reference to an <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite"></xref> interface used to interact with the platform infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: En referens till en <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite"> </xref> gränssnitt som används för att interagera med plattformsinfrastrukturen.

trans-unit.source: Returns the best matching audio output supported by a given synthesize engine response to a request to the synthesizer engine for the support of a particular output format.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar den mest matchande ljuduppspelning som stöds av en viss synthesize motorn svar på en begäran till synthesizer motorn för stöd för en viss utdataformat.

trans-unit.source: The structure used as `targetWaveFormat` and returned by the method should compatible with the `WAVEFORMATEX` available under SAPI, and the returned value should be allocated using `CoTaskMemAlloc`.
trans-unit.target: En struktur som används som `targetWaveFormat` och som returneras av metoden bör kompatibel med den `WAVEFORMATEX` tillgängliga under SAPI, och bör tilldelas värdet som returneras med `CoTaskMemAlloc`.

trans-unit.source: The `struct` must provide functionality equivalent to: ``` internal struct WaveFormat { public Int16 FormatTag; public Int16 Channels; public int SamplesPerSec; public int AvgBytesPerSec; public Int16 BlockAlign; public Int16 BitsPerSample; public Int16 Size; } ```
trans-unit.target: Den `struct` måste ange funktioner som motsvarar:``` internal struct WaveFormat { public Int16 FormatTag; public Int16 Channels; public int SamplesPerSec; public int AvgBytesPerSec; public Int16 BlockAlign; public Int16 BitsPerSample; public Int16 Size; } ```

trans-unit.source: Valid member of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeakOutputFormat"></xref> enumeration indicating the type of requested audio output format.
trans-unit.target: Giltig medlem av den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeakOutputFormat"> </xref> uppräkning som anger vilken typ av begärda ljuduppspelning format.

trans-unit.source: A pointer to a <xref uid="langword_csharp_struct" name="struct" href=""></xref> containing detail setting for the audio format type requested by the `speakOutputFormat` argument.
trans-unit.target: En pekare till en <xref uid="langword_csharp_struct" name="struct" href=""> </xref> som innehåller information om inställningen för den ljudformat typen som begärts av den `speakOutputFormat` argumentet.

trans-unit.source: Returns a valid <xref uid="langword_csharp_IntPtr" name="IntPtr" href=""></xref> instance referring to a <xref uid="langword_csharp_struct" name="struct" href=""></xref> containing detailed information about the output format.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar en giltig <xref uid="langword_csharp_IntPtr" name="IntPtr" href=""> </xref> instans som hänvisar till en <xref uid="langword_csharp_struct" name="struct" href=""> </xref> som innehåller detaljerad information om utdataformatet.

trans-unit.source: Removes a lexicon currently loaded by the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Synthesizer" name="Synthesizer" href=""></xref><xref uid="langword_csharp_Voice" name="Voice" href=""></xref> implemented by the current <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Tar bort en lexikonet som för närvarande är inlästa av den <xref uid="langword_csharp_Synthesizer" name="Synthesizer" href=""> </xref> <xref uid="langword_csharp_Voice" name="Voice" href=""> </xref> implementerats av aktuellt <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml"> </xref> instans.

trans-unit.source: A pronunciation lexicon is a collection of words or phrases together with their pronunciations specified using an appropriate pronunciation alphabet.
trans-unit.target: En uttal lexikonet är en samling med ord eller fraser tillsammans med deras uttal anges med en lämplig uttal alfabetet.

trans-unit.source: This method is typically called in response to a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis> based applications calling <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A> and using the `Synthesizer``Voice` implemented by the current <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml> instance.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden anropas vanligtvis som svar på en <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis>baserat program som anropar <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A>och använder den `Synthesizer``Voice` implementerats av aktuellt <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>instans.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis>

trans-unit.source: A valid instance of <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.Uri" name="System.Uri" href=""></xref> indicating the location of the lexicon information.
trans-unit.target: En giltig instans av <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.Uri" name="System.Uri" href=""> </xref> anger placeringen av informationen om lexikonet.

trans-unit.source: A reference to an <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite"></xref> interface passed in by the platform infrastructure to allow access to the infrastructure resources.
trans-unit.target: En referens till en <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite"> </xref> gränssnittet skickades av plattformsinfrastruktur för att tillåta åtkomst till infrastrukturresurser.

trans-unit.source: Renders specified <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"></xref> array in the specified output format.
trans-unit.target: Konstrollera anges <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"> </xref> matris i angivet utdataformat.

trans-unit.source: The structure used as `waveHeader` and returned by the method should compatible with the `WAVEFORMATEX` available under SAPI.
trans-unit.target: En struktur som används som `waveHeader` och som returneras av metoden bör kompatibel med den `WAVEFORMATEX` tillgängliga under SAPI.

trans-unit.source: The `struct` must provide functionality equivalent to: ``` internal struct WaveFormat { public Int16 FormatTag; public Int16 Channels; public int SamplesPerSec; public int AvgBytesPerSec; public Int16 BlockAlign; public Int16 BitsPerSample; public Int16 Size; } ```
trans-unit.target: Den `struct` måste ange funktioner som motsvarar:``` internal struct WaveFormat { public Int16 FormatTag; public Int16 Channels; public int SamplesPerSec; public int AvgBytesPerSec; public Int16 BlockAlign; public Int16 BitsPerSample; public Int16 Size; } ```

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"></xref> instances containing the text to be rendered into speech.
trans-unit.target: En matris med <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"> </xref> instanser som innehåller texten som ska renderas i tal.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_IntPtr" name="IntPtr" href=""></xref> pointing to a structure containing audio output format.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_IntPtr" name="IntPtr" href=""> </xref> pekar på en struktur som innehåller ljuduppspelning format.

trans-unit.source: A reference to an <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite"></xref> interface passed in by the platform infrastructure to allow access to the infrastructure resources.
trans-unit.target: En referens till en <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite"> </xref> gränssnittet skickades av plattformsinfrastruktur för att tillåta åtkomst till infrastrukturresurser.
